ygData.subject: Re: My Alliance bots prepare for battle
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Zardus turns toward a console, tapping a few buttons and seeing the computer reports on the estimated course of the bots. They might attack here, Zardus

::Zardus::

Zardus turns toward a console, tapping a few buttons and seeing the 
computer reports on the estimated course of the bots.

"They might attack here," Zardus replies to Wheeljack, "But their 
course could also take them to the Predacon or the Maximal bases. 
We'll wait for now."




--- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::Banzai-Tron/Hellbat/Hurricane/Wheeljack:::
> 
> ::No sooner than Banzai-Tron gets out of the CR does he hear 
Zardus' 
> transmission.  He armed himself::
> Banzai-Tron: Someone's gonna die today!
> ~~~~~
> ::Hellbat and Hurricane hear Zardus' transmission and arm their 
weapons, 
> preparing for battle::
> ~~~~~
> ::Wheeljack hears Zardus' transmission and opens his comm::
> Wheeljack: Commander Zardus, where is the battle, here or somewhere 
else?
